title: RP Spent, but gift not sent
body:
So I bought the elemental Lux skin gift for my friend and I only just found out a mouth later they don't have it. Since for some reason all my gifting and rp purchase history is empty I need some help on how to get a refund or how to get this skin to my friend without spending more money. If it wasn't a 35 dollar skin I wouldn't be even bothering with this. 

Please give me some tips or help.


http://i900.photobucket.com/albums/ac204/King_Necrow/wtf_zpsxw1nihzx.png?t=1485836220

replies.body: Looking into this, I don't see any gifts that have been sent from the account you're posting from.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can look into your specific issue.  We'll investigate further and offer more context as soon as we can!
